PreReceiptRefundBillSqlResource.SelectIncludeCity: SELECT [PreReceiptRefundBills].Id,RefundAmount,AuditState,AuditTime,IsDeleted,[PreReceiptRefundBills].CreateTime,[PreReceiptRefundBills].LastUpdateTime,City_Id,PreReceiptBill_Id,BillNo,PreReceiptBillNo,[City].Id Id,[City].NewId NewId,[City].Name Name FROM dbo.PreReceiptRefundBills WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.Orgs City WITH(NOLOCK) ON City_Id=City.Id
PreReceiptRefundBillSqlResource.Delete: UPDATE dbo.PreReceiptRefundBills SET IsDeleted=1 WHERE Id=@Id
